dereference.description: Follow links, similar to `lstat`, default is "true", just like in the native Node.js `fs.stat` function, use `nikita.fs.lstat` to retrive link information.

target.description: Location of the file to analyse

uid.description: The numeric user identifier of the user that owns the file (POSIX).

gid.description: The numeric group identifier of the group that owns the file (POSIX).

size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

atime.description: The timestamp indicating the last time this file was accessed expressed in milliseconds since the POSIX Epoch.

mtime.description: The timestamp indicating the last time this file was modified expressed in milliseconds since the POSIX Epoch.
